platform.core.profile.category.notifications=通知 notifications.filters.cancel=キャンセル notifications.filters.submit=保存 notifications.filters.type.label=フィルターの種類： ### Missing: notifications.filters.type.hint=How the filter should act towards an event in the given location ### Missing: notifications.filters.location.label=Filter scope: ### Missing: notifications.filters.location.hint=What part of the wiki should be concerned by the filter?
## Advanced filters options ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.advanced=Advanced filtering options ### Missing: notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.hint=These filters are activated by default, you can disable them by using the button next to each filter. ### Missing: notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.name=Filter name notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.description=詳細 ### Missing: notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.toggle=Toggle notifications.filters.advanced.modal.close=閉じる
## Filters names ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.systemUserNotificationFilter=System Filter ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.systemUserNotificationFilter=Hide notifications from the System user unless the event specifically targets you ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.ownEventsNotificationFilter=Own Events Filter ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.ownEventsNotificationFilter=Hide notifications about your own activity unless the event specifically targets you ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.eventReadAlertFilter=Read Event Filter (Alert) ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.eventReadAlertFilter=Hide notifications that you have marked as read ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.eventReadEmailFilter=Read Event Filter (Email) ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.eventReadEmailFilter=Hide notifications that you have marked as read ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.minorEventAlertNotificationFilter=Minor Event (Alert) ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.minorEventAlertNotificationFilter=Hide notifications concerning minor changes on pages ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.minorEventEmailNotificationFilter=Minor Event (Email) ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.minorEventEmailNotificationFilter=Hide notifications concerning minor changes on pages
## Translation keys for the scopeNotificationFilter ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.name=Scope Notification Filter notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.page=ページのみ notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.space=ページと子ページ notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.wiki=ウィキ
## Notifications toggles ### Missing: notifications.toggle.disabled.hint=You need to enable notifications in your settings if you wish to watch these locations
## Notifications formats notifications.format.alert=アラート notifications.format.email=Eメール
## Filter preferences settings notifications.filters.preferences.delete.inProgress=削除しています… notifications.filters.preferences.delete.done=フィルターの設定を削除しました！ notifications.filters.preferences.delete.error=フィルターの設定を削除できませんでした notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.inProgress=保存しています… notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.done=フィルターの設定を保存しました！ notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.error=フィルターの設定を保存できませんでした ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.allEvents=All events (even disabled)
## System Filter preferences settings ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.title=System Filters ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.hint=System filters that you can switches to have a more fine-grained control of the notifications you want to receive. ## Header definition for notification filter preferences notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.name=名称 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.filterType=詳細 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.notificationFormats=フォーマット ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.isEnabled=Is enabled?
## Custom Filter preferences settings ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.title=Custom Filters ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.hint=Create filters to control the notifications you want to receive. ## Header definition for notification filter preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.name=Location ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.filterType=Filter Action notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.eventTypes=イベント notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.notificationFormats=フォーマット ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.isEnabled=Is enabled? notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table._actions=アクション notifications.filters.type.custom.inclusive=イベントを通知 notifications.filters.type.custom.exclusive=イベントを無視
## Add filter modal notifications.settings.addFilter=フィルターを追加 ### Missing: notifications.settings.addFilter.hint=Create a filter for events happening on specific locations. The filter can trigger the sending of a notification or prevent one from being sent, depending on the event and the notification channel. ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.location.label=Location ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.location.hint=This filter applies on the events happening on the locations selected here. Select one or more locations. notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.type.label=アクション ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.type.hint=This filter can either notify of or ignore the events happening on the selected locations. Choose the action you want to take for the events. notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.filterType.inclusive=イベントを通知 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.filterType.exclusive=イベントを無視 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.notificationFormat.label=チャンネル ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.notificationFormat.hint=This filter applies only to the notifications sent on the communication channels selected below. Choose one or more communication channels. notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.eventType.label=イベント ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.eventType.hint=This filter applies to the events selected here, in the locations selected above. Choose one or more events. ### Missing: notifications.menu.header=Notifications ### Missing: notifications.menu.header.settings=Settings notifications.menu.clear=全て消去 notifications.menu.clearing=通知を消去しています notifications.menu.cleared=通知を消去しました notifications.settings.title=通知の設定 ### Missing: notifications.settings.error.notAdmin=You need to be administrator to see this. ### Missing: notifications.settings.menu=Notification menu ### Missing: notifications.settings.menu.hint=The notification menu is located on the top right of the page, and you can see it by clicking on the bell ({0}) notifications.settings.email=Eメール ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification settings. ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.disabled=The notifications emails are disabled. Please contact your administrator. ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.hint=An email is sent to you regularly with a summary of what happened on the wiki ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.title=Email Preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.frequency=Email Frequency ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.frequency.hint=Choose how often you want to receive an email with the summary of what happened on the wiki. ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.diffType.hint=Select the level of detail you want to receive about all the changes in the email. notifications.settings.saving=設定を保存しています… notifications.settings.saved=保存しました！ notifications.settings.savingfailed=設定を保存できませんでした ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters=Filters ({0}) ### Missing: notifications.settings.errorFilterWiki=Error: you must select a wiki, not a page ### Missing: notifications.settings.preferences=Preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.preferences.hint=Capture what events are happening and deliver them in the stream or by email. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.title=Applications ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.hint=This is the list of applications that can send notifications. You can enable or disable any of them. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification settings. notifications.settings.applications.appName=名称 notifications.settings.events=イベント ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.title=Watched Pages ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.autowatchmode=Automatic page watching ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.autowatchmode.hint=Decide if you wish to watch a page after you have worked on it ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification settings. ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.disabled=The watched entities are disabled. Please contact your administrator. ### Missing: notifications.events.by=edited by {0}. ### Missing: notifications.events.lastChange=Last change: {0}. ### Missing: notifications.events.lastComment=Last comment: {0}. ### Missing: notifications.preferences.scope.table.scope=Scope ### Missing: notifications.preferences.scope.table.location=Location ### Missing:
